           Day 1. Agree price. Apply for a mortgage.                                                                                    Day 2 to 6. Building Society valuation and paperwork.                                                                                          Day 7. Approved mortgage offer ready for exchange.

                                                                                                                                If there is one eternal truth about house hunting
                                                                                                                          it is this: the moment that you find your dream home,
                                                                                                                          someone else will put in an offer for it.
                                                                                                                                In our experience, victory doesn’t always go to the
                                                                                                                          couple with the most money. It often goes to those
                                                                                                                          with the speediest building society.
                                                                                                                                This is why, at Nationwide Anglia, as part of our
                                                                                                                          comprehensive mortgage service we work flat out to
                                                                                                                          be fastest off the mark.
                                                                                                                                For a start we can approve your mortgage level
                                                                                                                          before you even find the house.
                                                                                                                                Then, when you do, and you apply to us for a
                                                                                                                          mortgage, we’ll value the property and get back to
                                                                                                                          you with a firm decision inside seven days (our record
                                                                                                                          is less than 4 hours).
                                                                                                                                And if there is a delay which is out of our hands
                                                                                                                          we’ll still report back: we’ll never leave you dangling.
                                                                                                                                If you’re in a race for a house we suggest you call at
                                                                                                                          your nearest Nationwide Anglia branch at once.
                                                                                                                                It’s rather like having Linford Christie in your team.
